ing: 1 1/4 cups Ocean SprayÂ® Blueberry Juice Cocktail, chilled
3/4 cup Ocean SprayÂ® Fresh Blueberries, cleaned and rinsed
1 cup vanilla yogurt or vanilla frozen yogurt
des: "Try refreshing Blueberry Smoothies from Ocean Spray for a treat the whole family can enjoy all summer long."
ins:
Combine blueberry juice cocktail and blueberries in a blender.
Cover; blend on high speed until mixture is smooth.
Add yogurt; blend until thoroughly combined.
